Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two people communicating over long distances using a string telephone.
The student can include a clear depiction of the string connecting two paper cups to show how the telephone works.
The student can illustrate sound traveling through the string to represent how people hear each other.
The student can show how the string must be tight for the telephone to work effectively.
The student can include labels or explanations to highlight the use of sound in the communication device.
The student can incorporate an element showing the provided materials (e.g., paper cups, string).
